price: Kuma abõkin haɗinsa* ya ce: "Wannan shi ne abin da ke tãre da ni halarce."
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
footnotes: * Malã'ika mai rubũtun aikinsa. Bã ya rabuwa da shi sai a hãlãye uku, wurin jimã'i da salga da wanka. Malã'ikan da aka haɗa shi da shi dõmin ya rubũta ayyukansa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
